testsuite.name: org.loginModule.ShoppingCardPageTestClass

testcase.name: VerifyUseraddmultipleProductToShoppingCard
testcase.system-out: The user is able to select multiple products successfully

testcase.name: verifyMultipleProductSpecification
testcase.system-out: Both Actrual and Expected Product name is match! Both Actrual and Expected Product price is match!

testcase.name: VerifyAfterClickingContinueShopingBtnUserRedirctToHomePage
testcase.system-out: User is redirected to the home page

testcase.name: VerifyAfterClickingCheckoutBtnUserRedirctToCheckOutPage
testcase.system-out: User is redirected to the CheckOutPage

testsuite.system-out: displayed Page Title The user is able to select multiple products successfully Both Actrual and Expected Product name is match! Both Actrual and Expected Product price is match!
